title: [LFT] Challenger ADC ~ Looking for competitive team

embed.description: CorporaI / Challenger 196LP / 119W 99L Win Ratio 55% / Ezreal - 38W 31L Win Ratio 55%, Lucian - 20W 13L Win Ratio 61%, Jhin - 16W 8L Win Ratio 67%, Varus - 15W 9L Win Ratio 63%, Ashe - 10W 9L Win Ratio 53%

body:
Looking for a competitive team with the goal of entering the OCS.
I am rank ~150 [21/04] and still climbing and improving everyday.
I can play all meta adcs proficiently as well as hyper carries like twitch and kogmaw.
Add me on league if you have an offer.
I am open to constructive criticism and would openly take all advice that will help me improve as a player.
Available most nights + weekends.
IGN: Corporai

Prefer master+ teams.

replies.body: You need to be building twitch more ad heavy, he doesn't have any damaging on hit effects so stacking mainly attack speed on him is wasted dps.

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=QoT1zAFH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-21T18:24:42.830+0000)
>

You get the same items he does on twitch... Please stop

I get damage before attack speed though, and the attack speed item I get works with the previous item which is already heavy damage and the next item I get which uses damage, crit damage and crit chance to multiply the effectiveness of the lifesteal + damage + attack speed + crit chance that I have. I order my build to be most effective at all stages of the game based on how the game works in its progression.

Thats how I end up with graphs like [this](http://imgur.com/a/m46az)
is that how you end up with ranks like [this](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=whitepumah) with 5300+ games on your belt. And you want to make diamond+ teams

Rank is irrelevant due to the nature of 5v5 and the fact that it is based on win or loss and NOT on how you perform.

If there was a 1v1 mode then that would be accurate enough to determine player skill.

or if they implemented the performance based system that I recommended then that would also be accurate enough to determine player skill.
Gotta lift your game man, cant be losing to plat players in balanced games.
when you start ruby crystal + control ward on support and take exh/heal... you told me you want to go pro but you just insult everyone high elo who will tell you your bloodthirster rush build is bad

I never insult anyone despite all the insults I get, I simply explain my reasons for everything that I do.

Until I am proven wrong using maths, I have no reason to believe anything anyone from any elo says.
